11:00 <marclaporte> has joined #xwiki  
11:00 <marclaporte> Hi!  
11:05 <marclaporte> Anyone going to WikiSym?  
11:05 <vmassol> hi marclaporte  
11:06 <vmassol> hmm I didn't realize there was a WikiSym conference, let me check the dates  
11:07 <vmassol> marclaporte: is the CFP still open?  
11:08 <vmassol> hmm no seems it's over  
11:09 <marclaporte> Registration is still early bird :-)  
11:09 <vmassol> ok thanks, I usually go to conference where I can speak ;) But I've noted it down for next year!  
11:09 <vmassol> now it would be great if someone from the xwiki community could go there, you could send a mail on the xwiki users list maybe?  
11:16 <marclaporte> The site is powered by xwiki!  
11:16 <marclaporte> I hope someone from xwiki will be present :-)  
11:16 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:16 <vmassol> marclaporte: hehe, that's awesome, didn't realize it  
11:17 <vmassol> http://www.wikisym.org/ws2012/bin/view/Main/  : nice  
11:17 <vmassol> :)  
11:19 <vmassol> marclaporte: isn't the registration free for sponsors? :)  
11:19 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
11:19 <vmassol> (xwiki being a sponsor with the wiki software...)  
11:20 <marclaporte> hehe  
11:21 <vmassol> marclaporte: is the program announced already?  
11:21 <vmassol> (can't find it)  
11:21 <marclaporte> not yet  
11:21 <marclaporte> There are presentations and an Open Space section  
11:23 <sburjan> has quit  
11:27 <vmassol> marclaporte: just added your site to our reference list: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/References/WikiSym  
11:27 <vmassol> feel free to edit and improve ;)  
11:30 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
11:30 <marclaporte> super!  
11:31 <marclaporte> Here is program for 2011: http://www.wikisym.org/ws2011/program:schedule  (so it gives you an idea of what will be in store for 2012)  
11:36 <vmassol> marclaporte: thanks  
11:41 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki

15:07 <r4is3> has joined #xwiki  
15:07 <r4is3> Hi \*  
15:07 <r4is3> I 'm trying to upgrade my xwiki installation  
15:07 <r4is3> but after few tryies  
15:08 <r4is3> that dones not work  
15:09 <r4is3> from from 3.5.1 to latest  
15:09 <r4is3> and here is the problem :  
15:09 <r4is3> 2012-06-27 10:13:59,951 [http://192.168.100.198:8080/xwiki/bin/view/Main/] WARN  o.h.u.JDBCExceptionReporter    - SQL Error: 1062, SQLState: 23000  
15:09 <r4is3> 2012-06-27 10:13:59,952 [http://192.168.100.198:8080/xwiki/bin/view/Main/] ERROR o.h.u.JDBCExceptionReporter    - Duplicate entry '-5772955715567859860' for key 'PRIMAR  
15:10 <r4is3> I don't understand anything about that  
15:10 <r4is3> could anyone give me direction?  
15:10 <r4is3> ie. please help ;)  
15:13 <marclaporte> has quit  
15:23 <polx> has quit  
15:29 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
15:34 <vmassol1> r4is3: are you upgrading to 4.1.3?  
15:35 <vmassol1> I'm a bit busy right now but the best would be to post to the xwiki user list and explain your problem  
15:41 <r4is3> OH, OK  
15:41 <r4is3> oups capslock, sorry  
15:41 <r4is3> thx for advice
